name: Bake My Day
description:
Controls:

Left Mouse - Point the mouse and HOLD the left button to move the rolling pin to where you want it!

Right Mouse - Activate a boost!

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Bake My Day is a defender-ish game made for Mini Jam 94, with the theme of BAKING and the limitation of ONLY 2 BUTTONS!

Use your rolling pin to squash bad ingredients before they make it to the mixing bowl!

Squashing bad ingredients will allow you to use boosts, which can force good ingredients to spawn. Use wisely!

Feedback always welcome, and thanks for playing!
